column2:
This image displays a certificate for film certification issued by the Central Board of Film Certification of India, featuring a central board emblem and a seal with the inscription "MINISTRY OF INFORMATION & BROADCASTING, GOVERNMENT OF INDIA" at the top. The certificate bears the name "DAJIRAO MASTANI" and is certified "U" for all audiences. The certificate also includes a logo reading "CBFC" in the upper right corner and is dated November 12, 2018.

In the lower-right corner, there is a signature, and the certificate is signed by an official from the Central Board of Film Certification of India.

Overall, the certificate serves as official proof of the film's compliance with Indian censorship guidelines, indicating that it has been deemed suitable for public viewing.

The image shows a large group of people in a dark, possibly nighttime setting, lined up with multiple row of heavy cannons that appear to be on the verge of being fired. Each row of cannons has at least 2 men beside each cannon, holding torches and wearing traditional Indian military uniforms with helmets.

The cannons are dark-colored and appear to be made of metal, with two small fires burning atop each one, possibly representing flames. One torch on the left is bright orange and red, but the other torches are faint and appear as orange and yellow.

The men are mostly obscured by the shadows, but they appear to be dressed in old-fashioned clothing and headwear, possibly made from leather, fur, or woven textiles. They seem to be prepared for battle, but it is difficult to discern their facial expressions or emotions.

In the background, there are rolling mountains and a dark, cloudy sky that suggests the scene is set during either dawn or dusk. The overall atmosphere is tense and ominous, with the men's postures and the presence of the cannons suggesting that they are preparing for an intense confrontation.

This cinematic still depicts a battle scene with a warrior at the forefront, grasping a curved sword and a hilt with his right hand. He stands in front of a line of men, clad in helmets, armor, and chainmail shirts, each holding their own weapon, including a sword and shields with tall red flags. The warrior appears to be wearing a helmet and a tunic, while the men behind him are equipped with chainmail shirts, adding to the overall sense of tension and conflict.

The dark, hazy background suggests that this image is a still from an action-packed movie, capturing a dramatic moment of combat. The warrior's powerful stance and the men's defensive formation convey a sense of intensity, evoking the energy of a high-stakes battle scene.

The image shows a partial view of a man dressed in medieval attire, with his back to the camera. He is wearing a chainmail garment, a white glove on his right hand, and a helmet that is primarily white with a metallic appearance.

The background is a darkened, out-of-focus scene that suggests he is in a fortification, although it is not clear where this is. The mood of the image is serious and ominous, with a dark color palette.

A man in full armor stands in the center of the frame, with his helmet and armor adorned with intricate designs. He appears to be wearing a tunic underneath the armor, and his cape is draped over his shoulders. The armor has a brown color scheme, and his attire suggests that he is a soldier or warrior, although the image does not provide further context about his affiliation or role.

In the background, a crowd of people can be seen, but their faces are blurred, obscuring any distinguishing features. The atmosphere of the image suggests a serious and intense scene, possibly during a battle or a dramatic event.

This scene depicts an emotional moment between a woman and a man, captured in a warm embrace.

The woman, adorned in traditional Indian attire, has long dark hair and wears a stunning gold chain necklace and nose ring. Her arm is wrapped around the man's neck, conveying a sense of closeness and affection. In contrast, the man is partially obscured by the woman's head and arm, but his short dark hair and white shirt are visible.

A woman in a traditional Indian wedding dress is the central figure in this image. She is dressed in a white wedding dress with long sleeves, adorned with gold accents, and wears a white veil over her dark hair, styled in an updo. The dress features a long train and a high neckline, and she accessorizes with a large necklace.

She stands confidently in front of a decorative backdrop, with her hands held in a dynamic pose, as if she is mid-dance movement.

In the background, a stunning wall with intricate carvings and small candles adds to the ambiance. On either side of the woman, two large fountains of clear water create a dramatic effect, while the lighting is soft and warm, with gold accents that match the bride's wedding dress.

The overall atmosphere is festive and joyous, suggesting that this is a special occasion, possibly a wedding or celebration.

The image shows the close-up headshot of an adult man. He is facing the camera, with most of his face and shoulders visible. The man is very dark skinned with short, black hair, and a well-groomed beard. He is wearing an earpiece in his left ear. He has a serious expression. The image quality is dark, but there is a shadow of what appears to be another person to the right of him.

The image captures a scene from an Indian film, depicting a horse with a man riding it, dressed in traditional turbans and a sword at his side. The rider is wearing a red turban, accompanied by a smaller turban under it, and is attired in a beige and brown outfit, with a tan jacket and brown pants. He is riding a black horse with a yellow harness, and holds the reins in his left hand, while his right hand is down near his side. He wears a large, light-colored scarf, possibly white, draped over his shoulders and around his chest and neck, which appears to be a traditional garment worn by Indian men.

In the background, onlookers observe the scene from the side of a road. A small white building, a tree, and other individuals in the scene are also visible. The atmosphere suggests that this is a still from an Indian film, showcasing traditional attire and cultural context.

The image shows a man in armor facing a woman with her hands outstretched. The man is dressed in an intricately detailed patterned cloak with a cutout at the back of the neck. He has his back to the camera and is facing a woman, who is wearing a yellow and purple sari. 

There is a gold headband on the woman's forehead, and the scene is set in a room with a high, ornate ceiling, with candles providing soft, warm lighting. The overall atmosphere is one of luxury and elegance, with the ornate details of the setting and the characters' clothing suggesting a formal and ceremonial occasion.

A muscular, shirtless man is the central figure in this image, positioned centrally in a dimly lit, room with brown walls and three tall columns lining the wall. The man stands on a raised platform or dais, with his head slightly tilted to his right. His left hand is at his waist, while his right hand hangs down, fingers bent slightly towards his body. The platform has a stone or concrete floor, and a bowl rests on it. A lit candelabra is visible in the bottom right corner of the image.

The overall atmosphere of the image is mysterious and dramatic, with the dim lighting and the man's powerful physique creating a sense of intensity.

A man wearing a white shirt stands in front of a wall with a partially obscured chandelier hanging in the background. He has a shaved head, and his white collared shirt has a small mandarin-style collar. 

The wall behind him is out of focus, and there are several lights reflecting off the wall, as well as what appear to be a circular object behind him, likely a white chandelier.

The image is a photograph of a woman in a white dress, kneeling on the floor and holding a long, white weapon against a wall in a doorway.

The woman wears a white long-sleeve dress and has dark hair pulled back. She holds a long, white weapon with a long handle across her body, in the air, in front of her.

There is a wall of intricate stone carvings to the left of the woman, with a large, ornate arch and two stone pillars to the left of the doorway. In front of the woman is a low, round, decorative table or bench, covered in a blue and red patterned material. 

On the right side of the doorway, there appears to be another, similar table with a purple and blue patterned cover. There are several light sources, but most of them appear to be candlelit, and their light sources appear dim.

The image depicts a woman seated on a throne in an ornate room, likely a palace or throne room. She is dressed in a long, black and gold gown, adorned with gold embroidery, and has a golden headdress that is being styled by another woman. The throne features intricate carvings and a gold seat, set against the backdrop of an opulent wall adorned with ornate gold decorations.

The room is dimly lit, with only a few gold chandeliers casting a warm, golden glow. The atmosphere is one of grandeur and luxury, with the woman's regal attire and the opulent surroundings evoking a sense of importance and power.

The image depicts an ornate, grandiose room featuring a group of women dressed in elegant gowns. The background showcases a majestic high ceiling, adorned with several large clocks, and a series of arches and columns that surround the women as they dance in the center of the room.

This image depicts a man dressed in traditional Indian attire, sitting in a room adorned with intricate furnishings. He is wearing a majestic red turban, complemented by a long-sleeved shirt and a flowing yellow outfit. His attire is further embellished with a golden sash and a delicate beaded necklace, adding a touch of elegance to his overall appearance. The man is seated in front of a wall featuring an ornate circular design, which is set against a backdrop of a room with a wooden floor and high ceilings.

The image presents a serene scene of a person in a white, floor-length dress kneeling on a vibrant red and gold rug, possibly engaged in a prayer or meditation session.

In the foreground, the individual's hands are clasped together, adorned with gold bangles and rings, while their arms are covered by a flowing white dress. The dress features a subtle sequin pattern and has been folded back to reveal the bangles on their left hand. A red, circular bag rests nearby, and a golden chain is visible beneath the red rug in the middle of the scene.

The background, out of focus, suggests a dimly lit room with a wooden wall and six soft, glowing orbs that may be lit candles. The overall atmosphere of the image conveys a sense of calm and contemplation.

A woman in dark attire, with a serious and contemplative expression, is the central figure in this dimly lit setting. The woman is dressed in a dark head covering and dark attire, with an ornament adorning her forehead, adding to the somber atmosphere. The background is indistinct, but the soft, muted light casts a gentle glow on the wall behind her, creating a sense of quiet reverence. The overall mood is one of solemnity and introspection, as if the woman is lost in thought.

This image depicts a still from a movie, featuring a man attired in a regal red and gold robe with gold trim, adorned with gold jewelry, and wearing a large gold crown and a long, flowing beard. He sits on a large ornate gold chair, set against a backdrop of gold-patterned wall coverings and candles in the background.

The image depicts a lively scene of a group of people dancing in a tent. The group is dressed in a mix of white and red garments and black vests, with some wearing hats and white pants. The individuals are arranged in a line on the left and right sides of the image, while a man in a white outfit, black boots, and a mask stands in the middle. Behind him, additional people can be seen dancing, as well as a chandelier and two lanterns.

The background of the image features a large, white, circular shape at the top and large windows behind the lanterns. The atmosphere is filled with a warm glow from the lighting, giving the impression of a lively celebration or festival, possibly taking place in a historical or cultural setting.

The image depicts a group of men dressed in traditional Indian attire, including turbans and long white pants, engaged in a chaotic scene with weapons in hand. The men are clad in traditional Indian garb, donning turbans and long white pants, and appear to be armed with weapons. The scene is shrouded in a hazy atmosphere, evoking the sense of a movie still, which is likely a scene from an Indian film.

The image shows two individuals adorned with jewelry and headpieces, set against a backdrop that resembles a blurry brown wall.

The foreground features a woman with her face turned downward, wearing a purple and gold headpiece that covers her hair, a matching purple veil that drapes over her shoulders, and a nose and lip ring. On her forehead and chin are a series of gold ornaments. Her right hand is raised to the man's face, although his hands and most of his body are cropped out of the frame. The man's turban is maroon with a white tassel, and he wears a matching maroon long-sleeve top. 

In the foreground, white water droplets are visible in front of the two people. The overall atmosphere is one of serenity and joy.

This image captures a scene of a woman adorned in traditional Indian attire, accompanied by other similarly attired individuals in the background. 

The woman stands in the foreground, showcasing a striking red sari with a green border, complemented by gold necklaces, earrings, and a bindi. Her hair is styled in a bun and a gold nose ring adorns her face. Behind her, other women dressed in similar attire are visible, set against a dimly lit backdrop featuring what appears to be a chandelier and columns.

The image captures a pivotal moment from a scene in an Indian movie. In the foreground, a woman is prominently featured, wearing a maroon and blue sari. She has long dark hair and is attired in an orange bracelet on her left arm. Her right hand is extended, while her left arm is bent at the elbow, drawing attention to her attire.

To the right of the frame, a hand is partially visible, adorned with a gold bracelet. The background is shrouded in darkness, with a small light source visible in the far left corner, adding to the dramatic ambiance of the scene. The overall composition of the image conveys a sense of intensity and drama, drawing the viewer's focus to the woman's outstretched hand and her striking attire.

A woman wearing a white dress stands on the steps of a building at night. Her outfit appears to be a white, ruffled dress with a long-sleeved top. She seems to be standing on the steps of a large building with several columns at the top of the steps. The building looks like it is lit by chandeliers, with an additional light on each of the six columns. The building has intricate carvings in the columns, and there are ornate, brown-patterned wall hangings at the end of each step.

The image depicts a man and a woman embracing, with the man on the left and the woman on the right. The man has a short haircut and wears an ornate cream-colored robe with a high lace collar, while the woman has long dark hair and wears a similar, long-sleeved cream-colored dress. They are standing close together, facing the same direction, with the man in front.

A small fire on the torch to the left is casting a warm glow on the scene, and white dots of light are visible in the background, although they are too blurry to identify what they are. The overall atmosphere is cozy and romantic, and the couple is seemingly in the background of the movie.

The image appears to be a still from an Indian movie. In the foreground, a man with a turban on his head is visible, wearing an earpiece that can be seen on his left ear. He is dressed in a white shirt.

In the background, there is a crowd of people present.

The image presents a woman adorned with a traditional Indian veil and numerous gold-colored, elaborate ornaments on her face, neck, and earrings. 

The woman is viewed from her chest to the top of her head. Her dark hair is pulled back, and she has a nose ring, an ornate piece of jewelry across her forehead, and a necklace of gold beads around her neck. She wears a gold necklace that seems to be composed of several chains and a row of gold beads that forms a necklace just below her chin. Her attire and jewelry evoke the style of traditional Indian wedding wear. 

The background of the image is slightly blurred and consists of the back view of someone's head to the left of the frame and indistinct lights in the distance.

The image depicts a still from an Indian movie, where a man in the foreground stands prominently, adorned in white traditional Indian attire, including long-sleeved white shirt, gray dhoti, and multiple pearl necklaces. He is shown sipping from a cup, while his bald head is shaved. A ring adorns his right hand.

Behind him, several men dressed similarly to him are seated or standing, while the background consists of a wooden wall with intricate carvings. The overall atmosphere suggests a moment of quiet contemplation or celebration within a traditional Indian setting.

The image depicts a group of people, dressed in white uniforms and hats, standing around a white horse-drawn carriage. Some of the individuals are also holding spears. The scene is set against a backdrop of two-story buildings in the background, suggesting a historical or ancient setting. The sky above is cloudy and grey, adding to the overall somber tone of the image.
The image appears to depict a scene of warfare with numerous warriors, including those wearing helmets and holding weapons, and others wearing battle attire and armor, all set against a cloudy sky.

The image depicts a person in traditional Indian attire standing in front of two large green doors, adorned with intricate carvings. They wear a distinctive outfit featuring a tan top with a brown patterned back, paired with a white saree and a long, red shawl draped elegantly around their shoulders. Standing at the entrance to a dark room, with their back turned away from the camera, the person is poised with their right hand to the side and their head turned forward.

The image depicts a group of men engaged in a sword fight, set against the backdrop of a majestic building with an ornate archway. The building's facade features multiple archways and pillars, with the grand archway adorned with candles on the floor and wall. In the foreground, the men are dressed in traditional Indian attire, each armed with swords and engaging in the battle.

The atmosphere of the scene is one of intense action, with the men clashing swords in a flurry of movement. The setting evokes a sense of drama and tension, as if the men are engaged in a life-or-death struggle.

The overall mood of the image is one of high stakes and urgency, with the men fully committed to their fight. The use of traditional Indian clothing and architecture adds a layer of cultural richness to the scene, while the dimly lit setting creates an air of mystery and intrigue.

The image depicts a woman wearing a white headscarf and holding a stick, suggesting a strong and determined figure.

She stands in front of a dark-colored wall or columned structure, with a wooden stick grasped in her hand, possibly indicating a sense of purpose or vigilance.

The woman's attire and the dim surroundings evoke a somber and contemplative atmosphere, hinting at a scene from a movie where she is portraying a significant or mysterious role.

The image is a scene from an Indian film or TV series that showcases a woman wearing traditional Indian attire, specifically a red and gold sari, holding a plate of food in a room illuminated by multiple light sources.

The woman, positioned centrally in the image, is holding a metal plate filled with an unidentifiable white and brown food. She is wearing a traditional Indian outfit, complemented by gold jewelry, and stands against a blurred background featuring a wooden wall adorned with square candle holders on the left side and an ornate tan wall in the background, punctuated by a large vertical window or mirror. The room appears to be dimly lit, with additional light sources visible near the bottom of the image.

The woman's traditional Indian attire and the cultural setting suggest that the image is from a movie or TV series that depicts Indian culture, possibly a period piece or a film that celebrates Indian heritage.

The image depicts a woman dancing in a large, opulent room filled with numerous people. She is dressed in a vibrant purple sari and appears to be barefoot, with her feet bent in a graceful pose. A blurred line extends from her left arm to her leg, suggesting she may be in motion, though it is difficult to determine due to the blurriness of the image.

The room behind her is adorned with numerous women in colorful saris, arranged in rows, many holding lit torches in their hands. Behind them, a majestic building with multiple archways and a black banister staircase dominates the background, adding to the grandeur of the scene. The overall atmosphere of the image suggests a formal event or ceremony, possibly a wedding or cultural celebration, taking place in a luxurious setting.

This image depicts two women, likely engaged in a traditional Indian dance performance, as suggested by their elegant, fluid movements.

The woman on the left is distinguished by her red hair accessory in a bun, complemented by a purple sari adorned with intricate gold designs. She wears gold necklaces, bangles, and a bindi. Her dark hair is styled up, and her arms are raised above her head, with her right arm bent and her hand pointing outward. In contrast, the woman on the right has her dark hair pulled back into an updo. She wears a red sari with gold embroidery and similar jewelry to her counterpart. Both women are turned to the right, their faces blurred, and their right arms are held above their heads, mirroring each other's movements. The background is blurry, but it appears to be a dimly lit room filled with people, likely an audience, gathered to watch the performance. The scene is set against a backdrop of soft lighting and a high ceiling, creating a warm and intimate atmosphere.

The image depicts a man in traditional white attire, posing in a covered outdoor location with a scenic backdrop of columns and a sunset. The man stands prominently in the center of the image, wearing a flowing white robe that drapes elegantly around his body. He leans forward, his head slightly bowed and arms bent in a contemplative pose, holding a bow and arrow in his right hand. Behind him, two ornate columns flank him, adding a sense of grandeur to the scene. The background features a breathtaking sunset with warm hues of yellow, orange, and pink, evoking a sense of serenity and tranquility.

This image appears to be a scene from an Indian movie, showcasing a woman and a man standing together. The woman, on the left, wears a striking red sari, complemented by gold jewelry, including a necklace, earrings, and a nose ring. Her hair is styled in an updo, adorned with a bun and a golden hair clip. On the right, the man sports a shaved head and is dressed in a green shirt. The background of the image is blurred but suggests a lavish setting with ornate walls and columns, implying a palace or similar opulent environment.

The image depicts two women standing in an opulent setting, with a woman on the left wearing a purple garment with a hood, and the woman on the right adorned in a pink sari and gold jewelry, which includes necklaces, earrings, and a nose ring.

The setting appears to be a grand building with columns and hanging lights, and a lush green plant on the right side of the frame.

The image presents a vast courtyard, surrounded by substantial structures that boast multiple stories and roofs adorned with flags, suggesting a sense of grandeur and cultural significance. In the foreground, a striking display of numerous chairs is arranged in rows, arranged around the court, creating a focal point for gatherings or ceremonies.

Beyond the courtyard, a majestic mountain range looms in the background, set against a backdrop of a stormy sky, evoking a sense of drama and intensity. The overall atmosphere is one of grandeur and solemnity, hinting at a sense of community or celebration taking place within this architectural complex.

The scene depicts a man clad in elaborate armor, standing in a well-lit room, grasping a lit sword in his hand.

The man's attire is intricate, featuring black chainmail armor adorned with gold accents. His armor is fully encased, excluding only his head, hands, and feet, which are protected by separate pieces of armor. A golden helmet covers his head, complete with a pointed crest on top.

The man stands in front of a lit fireplace, with the sword's flame dancing in front of him. He holds the sword in his right hand, its blade pointing downward toward the fire. The dark background of the room is illuminated by the light from the fireplace and a light fixture on the ceiling, which casts a warm glow. The atmosphere suggests the man is engaged in a ceremonial or religious act, possibly part of a rite of passage.

This image captures a dynamic scene from a Bollywood movie or television show, showcasing a group of men in traditional Indian attire gathered together.

In the foreground, a man stands prominently in the center-right, clad in a dark robe with gold accents and sporting a turban. Behind him, other men in various traditional Indian garb are gathered, some wearing similar turbans. In the background, another figure dons a white turban and robe, set against a blurred backdrop of tan and white buildings. The image is framed by a black border at the top and bottom, with a faint glow emanating from the top left corner.

This image depicts a woman standing in the rain, with her head tilted forward and her face close to a light source, likely the sun, judging by the position of the light. Her long dark brown hair appears wet, with a few strands blowing in the wind, while a single light-brown strand of hair stands out from the rest.

The woman is attired in a dark top or shirt and a black skirt, which appears to be wet, suggesting that the rain is heavy. Her attire and hair are the main objects visible in the image.

In the background, the image appears to be set against a dark, possibly concrete, wall. The overall scene exudes a somber and rainy atmosphere.

The image appears to be a still from an Indian movie, set at dusk, with a woman in a long white dress standing in a vast landscape with mountains in the background and what seems to be a body of water nearby. The woman stands to the right side of the image, in front of the body of water and the mountains, with her head slightly lowered and her arms crossed, suggesting that she is lost in thought or in prayer. To her left, there is a large structure visible above the water on the left side of the image. The structure is likely the home or a temple, which is a common architectural element in Indian movies.

The setting appears to be an idyllic and serene, with the mountains and body of water creating a picturesque backdrop. The overall atmosphere of the image suggests a peaceful and contemplative mood, with the woman's pose and the serene surroundings contributing to the sense of calm and reflection.

This image presents a captivating scene from an Indian movie, featuring a man and a woman standing together in a natural setting.

In the foreground, the man is dressed in a bare chest, with his right arm extended forward, grasping a thin rope, and his hair pulled back into a long ponytail. He is situated on the left side of the frame, facing right. To his right, the woman wears a white top, featuring a sleeveless design, and sports her hair in a neat bun. 

The background of the image showcases a serene landscape with rolling hills, evoking a sense of natural beauty and tranquility.

The image shows a man standing in the water, shirtless, with his right arm raised and left arm to the side.

The man has a beard and a necklace around his neck. His raised arm is splashing water in the air, with water droplets visible. The man is leaning slightly backward, facing the right side of the image, and is shown in mid-movement.

The background is a body of water, with a gray sky above. The overall atmosphere suggests a daytime setting. The mood appears to be somewhat melancholic, with a soft and ethereal quality to it.

In this atmospheric scene, a woman stands in the foreground of a majestic ancient chamber, characterized by its gothic architectural style and dramatic lighting.

The chamber's grandeur is accentuated by the tall pillars and arches that dominate the space, which is situated on a vast rocky expanse. Through the central arch, the sky can be seen, featuring clouds and a radiant yellow glow. The woman stands in the center of the room, clad in a long dress that reaches her ankles and has a subtle pattern, adding a touch of elegance to the otherwise somber atmosphere. She is surrounded by the imposing architecture, which features numerous ropes dangling from the pillars, creating an air of mystery and intrigue.

As the scene unfolds, the viewer is drawn into the woman's contemplative pose, lost in thought amidst the grandeur of her surroundings. The image invites the viewer to ponder the story behind this enigmatic figure, set against the backdrop of this historic and mysterious architectural marvel.

The image appears to be a list of names, with some of the names repeated multiple times and others only listed once, accompanied by additional text. The text is written in a language that appears to be Indian, suggesting that it may be from a movie or TV show featuring Indian talent.

The image depicts a vast, dusty canyon with a vast expanse of rugged terrain stretching out in the background. In the foreground, a rugged cliff on the right side of the image is covered in large rocks and greenery, with a similar cliff on the left side visible in the distance, although its details are unclear.

At the bottom of the image, a small cluster of large rocks appears to be perched at the edge of the cliffs, with a large cluster of smaller sticks forming a tree or bushes near the center of the frame.

The image conveys a sense of desolation and vastness, with the endless landscape stretching out into the distance. The sun appears to be shining brightly from the top of the frame, casting a hazy glow over the scene.
